detail_desc: Warm-lined boots in glossy imitation leather with a zip in the side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a draped knot detail at the hem.
Sandals in imitation suede with hook and loop fastenings. Imitation suede linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Patterned jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an open back with narrow ties.
Shorts in an airy, crinkled nylon blend. High waist with wide smocking and a small frill trim, side pockets and wide legs.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Playsuit in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a low-cut back, gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Lined triangle bikini top in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, wide tie at the waist and short, double-layered sleeves. Unlined.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, short butterfly sleeves and an open section at the back with wide ties at the hem.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket and side pockets. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Teddy coat in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Wide, V-neck cardigan in a soft mohair blend with buttons down the front, front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Fitted blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication over the shoulders and a sweetheart neckline with gathers at the bust. Smocking at the back and long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Wrist warmers in soft, rib-knit cashmere with thumbholes.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with one large zipped compartment at the top, an open inner compartment and two outer compartments, both with a zip. Adjustable shoulder strap with a carabiner hook at the bottom that allows you to choose which shoulder you want to carry your bag on. Size approx. 17x32 cm.
Comfort blanket in soft velour with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling. Length approx. 31 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Wide top in sturdy slub jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
Short skirt in jersey with shimmering details with an elasticated waist.
Wide poncho top in soft, printed jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Long, straight-style shirt in a cotton weave with short sleeves with wide buttoned cuff and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal Alice band with glittery horns at the top.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cotton twill shirt jacket in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders that have a tab and button. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in lace and mesh with moulded, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Trainer socks in a soft ribbed cotton blend with lace-trimmed tops.
5-pocket trousers in patterned stretch twill with a regular waist with a button, zip fly and slim legs with a zip at the hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Short, boxy blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and slits in the sides.
Cropped top in sequined, glittery jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a small stand-up collar, wrapover front and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Lightweight, unlined sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed shaft.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim down the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a flounce at the hem.
Satin top with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and crossover straps at the back. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in denim with stretch. Regular waist, button fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar, buttons down the front, a tapered waist and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline. Straight cut with a slit in one side. Unlined.
Satin top with lace at the back, a V-neck with a lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Cropped sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details. Lined hood with a collar, long raglan sleeves, cuffs with thumbholes, a zipped chest pocket, and a zip in the sides with slits in ventilating mesh. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and dungaree dress in soft fabric. Top in cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with an open chest pocket, concealed press-stud in one side and straps with adjustable buttoning.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
Crop tops in cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
T-shirt in soft cotton with contrasting colour panels along the shoulders and sleeves.
Rectangular sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft, waffled cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a yoke and short sleeves in lace. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt, and side pockets.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.
Sleeveless, fitted playsuit in jersey with a V-neck front and back, seam at the waist and knee-length legs.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in slub-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jacquard-knit pattern at the cuffs and hem.
Short, wide T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, printed sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Mesh trainers with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front, a lightly padded top edge and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Flared vest top in organic cotton jersey with a frill-trimmed hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Vest top in patterned organic cotton jersey with gathers in the side seams for a more comfortable fit.

Top in crinkled jersey with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with ties at the sides and a flounced trim.
Vest top in a soft, ribbed viscose blend.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
